body: Well when I'm playing the game and speculating there's like a name tag floating following me named 'ArcadeBoss' I'm not sure if this is part of the combat log plugin or something but it's getting annoying now someone please fine out what it is!!!! Thanks Ele.
body_tagged: Well when I'm playing the game and speculating there's like a name tag floating following me named 'ArcadeBoss' I'm not sure if this is part of the combat log plugin or something but it's getting annoying now someone please fine out what it is!!!! Thanks Ele.
title: What the heck is ArcadeBoss

replies.body:
This is a recent glitch that has been discovered.
Random nametags will appear floating above and around you in the 1.8 servers.
(DTM01 and CTW01)

This is a known bug and will be fixed soon.
